title: Ikkis
description: Patriotic war drama based on the life of Second Lt. Arun Khetarpal, a Param Vir Chakra recipient.

description: Sequel to the 2020 disaster thriller 'Greenland.' The Garrity family continues their fight for survival.

description: Romantic comedy based on Emily Henry's novel about two best friends and their annual vacation tradition.

description: Horror-comedy about a man uncovering mysteries in an ancient mansion.

description: Crime thriller involving a high-tech conspiracy.

description: The third installment in the '28 Days/Weeks Later' horror series.

title: The Rip
description: Crime thriller produced by Artists Equity label.

title: Rahu Ketu
description: Buddy comedy exploring themes of luck and superstition, by the team behind Fukrey.

title: Happy Patel: Khatarnak Jasoos
description: Spy spoof in which a bumbling British-Indian spy embarks on a mission in Goa.

title: Return to Silent Hill
description: Horror film sequel adapted from the 'Silent Hill 2' video game.

title: Border 2
description: Sequel to the 1997 war epic Border, timed for India's Republic Day weekend.

title: The Wrecking Crew
description: Action-comedy about half-brothers teaming up, produced by MGM/Amazon Studios.

title: Gandhi Talks

description: New adaptation of the classic Emily Brontë novel.

description: Heist thriller based on Don Winslow's novella.

description: Soulful urban romance capturing the struggles of young lovers in a modern city.

title: Scream 7
description: Next entry in the popular slasher franchise.

title: In the Blink of an Eye
description: Ambitious sci-fi drama spanning millennia; premieres at Sundance before streaming on Hulu.

title: Mardaani 3
description: Third installment of the crime thriller franchise, with Rani Mukerji returning as fearless cop Shivani Shivaji Roy.

title: Pati Patni Aur Woh Do
description: Sequel to the 2019 comedy, a humorous take on modern marriage and infidelity.

title: Dhurandhar 2
description: High-stakes spy thriller sequel by the director of Uri: The Surgical Strike, based on real intelligence operations.

title: Toxic
description: Period gangster drama (1940s–70s) described as a dark 'fairy tale for grown-ups,' exploring the drug underworld's rise.

description: Big-budget sci-fi adventure based on Andy Weir's novel, about an astronaut's mission to save Earth.

description: A feature-length continuation of the British crime saga.

description: Lavish period romance-drama set against a backdrop of conflict, with Bhansali's signature grand visual style.

description: Fifth installment of the beloved animated series.

description: Next Spider-Man film in the MCU, rumored to adapt the 'Brand New Day' storyline.

description: Conclusion of the Dune trilogy, expected to adapt Frank Herbert's Dune Messiah.
